schema.description:
The language selected for the returned product.

zh_CH: Chinese (default)

en_US: English

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: The response parameters.

createOnlyProperties.description: The properties that are specific to the create operation. You need to specify these properties when you create the resource. These properties are not returned when you query the resource.

items.description: The property that is specific to the create operation.

deleteOnlyProperties.description: The properties that are specific to the delete operation. You need to specify these properties when you delete the resource. These properties are not returned when you query the resource.

items.description: The property that is specific to the delete operation.

filterProperties.description: The properties that can be used to filter the resource when you list the resource.

getOnlyProperties.description: The properties that are specific to the query operation. You need to specify these properties when you query the resource. These properties are not returned in the query result.

items.description: The property that is specific to the query operation.

getResponseProperties.description: The properties that are returned when you query the resource.

items.description: The property that is returned when you query the resource.

handlers.description: The information about the operation, including the required Resource Access Management (RAM) permissions.

create.description: The information about the create operation.

permissions.description: The information about the required RAM permissions.

delete.description: The information about the delete operation.

permissions.description: The information about the required RAM permissions.

get.description: The information about the query operation.

permissions.description: The information about the required RAM permissions.

list.description: The information about the list operation.

permissions.description: The information about the required RAM permissions.

update.description: The information about the update operation.

permissions.description: The information about the required RAM permissions.

info.description: The basic information about the resource type.

chargeType.description:
The payment form. Valid values:

paid free

deliveryScope.description:
The delivery level. Valid values:

center

region

zone

description.description: The description of the resource type.
description.example: An ECS instance is equivalent to a virtual machine, including the most basic computing components such as CPU, memory, operating system, network, and disk. You can easily customize and change the configuration of the instance. You have full control over the virtual machine.

title.description: The name of the resource type.

listOnlyProperties.description: The properties that are specific to the list operation. You need to specify these properties when you list the resource. These properties are not returned when you query the resource.

items.description: The property that is specific to the list operation.

listResponseProperties.description: The properties that are returned when you list the resource.

items.description: The property that is returned when you query the resource.

properties.description: The resource properties. The key specifies the property name and the value specifies the details of the property.

publicProperties.description: The common properties of the resource. The common properties are not operation-specific.

readOnlyProperties.description: The read-only properties. These properties are returned only when you perform the List or Get operation. You do not need to specify these properties when you create or update the resource.

required.description: The properties that must be specified when you create the resource.

items.description: The property that must be specified when you create the resource.

resourceType.description: The type of the resource. If the resource belongs to a parent resource, the return format is {parent resource type code /resource type code}.

sensitiveInfoProperties.description: The sensitive properties, such as the password.

updateOnlyProperties.description: The properties that are specific to the update operation. You need to specify these properties when you update the resource. These properties are not returned when you query the resource.

items.description: The property that is specific to the update operation.

updateTypeProperties.description: The properties that can be modified.

items.description: The property that can be modified.

ListProducts.summary: Calls this operation to list the supported services.

schema.title: A short description of struct
schema.description:
Select the language in which the response is returned.

zh_CH: Chinese (default).

en_US: English.
The Cloud service provider. Only Aliyun is supported.
The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. If you leave this parameter empty, the query starts from the beginning.
The number of entries per page. Maximum value: 100.

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: The returned data.

maxResults.description: The maximum number of entries returned.

nextToken.title: 表示当前调用返回读取到的位置，空代表数据已经读取完毕
nextToken.description: A pagination token. It can be used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. If NextToken is empty, no next page exists.

totalCount.title: TotalCount本次请求条件下的数据总量，此参数为可选参数，默认可不返回
totalCount.description: The total number of entries returned.

ListResourceTypes.title: ListResourceTypes

CreateResource.summary: Calls this operation to create resources.

schema.description:
The request path. Specify this parameter in the following format: /api/v1/providers/{provider}/products/{product}/resources/{resourceType}

Variables in the request path:

provider: the Cloud service provider. Only Aliyun is supported.

product: the code of the service.

resourceType: the type of resources. If parent resource is specified, the format is {parent resource type code}/parent resource ID/{resource type code}.
The region ID. This parameter is required if a cloud service is a regionalized.
The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. If a cloud service supports idempotence, the parameter takes effect.
The request body. The property of the resource, which is specified in JSON format.

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: The response parameters.

resourcePath.title: 资源路径
resourcePath.description: The path of the resources. The relative resource ID. The resource path contains the complete resource location (parent resource/child resource).

taskId.title: 任务id
taskId.description: The ID of the asynchronous task. If the operation is asynchronous, this field is returned. In this case, the HTTP status code 202 is returned.

CreateResource.title: CreateResource
CreateResource.description: You can go to [OpenAPI Explorer](https://next.api.aliyun.com/cloudcontrol) to view the documentation and try out Cloud Control API.

DeleteResource.summary: Calls this operation to delete resources.

schema.description:
The request path. Specify this parameter in the following format: /api/v1/providers/{provider}/products/{product}/resources/{resourceType}/{resourceId}

Variables in the request path:

provider: the Cloud service provider. Only Aliyun is supported.

product: the code of the service.

ResourceType: the type of resources. If parent resource is specified, the format is {parent resource type code}/parent resource ID/{resource type code}.

resourceId: the resource ID.
The region. This parameter is required if a cloud service is a regionalized.
The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. If a cloud service supports idempotence, the parameter takes effect.

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: The response parameters.

taskId.description: The ID of the asynchronous task. If the operation is asynchronous, this field is returned. In this case, the HTTP status code 202 is returned.

DeleteResource.title: DeleteResource
DeleteResource.description: You can go to [OpenAPI Explorer](https://next.api.aliyun.com/cloudcontrol) to view the documentation and try out Cloud Control API.

GetResources.summary: You can call the operation to query resources.

schema.description:
The request path. You can call resources List and Get based on different request paths.

1.List: /api/v1/providers/{provider}/products/{product}/resources/{resourceType}

2.Get: /api/v1/providers/{provider}/products/{product}/resources/{resourceType}/{resourceId}

Variables in the request path. Valid values:

provider: the cloud service provider. Currently, only Aliyun is supported.

product: the product code.

resourceType: the type of the resource. If there is a parent resource, the format is {parent resource type code}/parent resource ID/{resource type code}.

resourceId: the ID of the resource.
The ID of the region. This parameter is required if the cloud product is deployed in a region.
The filter condition. The JSON format. You can use some resource properties as filter conditions.
The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. If you leave this parameter empty, the query starts from the beginning.
The number of entries per page. Maximum value: 100.

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: The response parameters.

maxResults.description: The maximum number of entries returned. Return result of the List operation.

nextToken.description: The pagination token. It can be used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. If NextToken is empty, no next page exists. Return result of the List operation.

resource.description: The specified resource. Return result of the Get operation.

resourceAttributes.description: The resource properties in the JSON format.

resources.description: The resource list. Return result of the List operation.

resourceAttributes.description: The resource properties in the JSON format.

totalCount.description: The total number of entries returned. Return result of the List operation.

GetResources.title: GetResources
GetResources.description:
You can go to [OpenAPI Explorer](https://next.api.aliyun.com/cloudcontrol) to view the documentation and try out CloudControl API.

You can call this operation to query resources List and Get based on different request paths.

UpdateResource.summary: Calls this operation to update resources.

schema.description:
The request path. Specify this parameter in the following format: /api/v1/providers/{provider}/products/{product}/resources/{resourceType}/{resourceId}

Variables in the request path:

provider: the Cloud service provider. Only Aliyun is supported.

product: the code of the service.

resourceType: the type of resources. If parent resource is specified, the format is {parent resource type code}/parent resource ID/{resource type code}.

resourceId: the resource ID.
The region ID. This parameter is required if a cloud service is a regionalized.
The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. If a cloud service supports idempotence, the parameter takes effect.
The request body. The property of the resource to be updated is specified in JSON format.

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: The response parameters.

taskId.description: The ID of the asynchronous task. If the operation is asynchronous, this field is returned. In this case, the HTTP status code 202 is returned.

UpdateResource.title: UpdateResource
UpdateResource.description:
You can go to [OpenAPI Explorer](https://next.api.aliyun.com/cloudcontrol) to view the documentation and try out Cloud Control API.

If resources fail to be updated at any time, the Cloud Control API does not roll the resource back to the original status.

The resource APIs cannot be rolled back. If the API operation is partially failed to be called, you can call the GetResource operation to view the latest status of the resource. If necessary, you can call the UpdateResource or DeleteResource operation to manually compensate for the failure.

GetTask.summary: Calls this operation to query a specified asynchronous task.

schema.title: 任务id
schema.description: The ID of the task.

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: The returned data.

createTime.description: The time when the task was created.

error.description: The error returned for the task.

resourcePath.description: The path of the resources. The relative resource ID. The resource path contains the complete resource location (parent resource/child resource).

status.description:
The task state.

Pending

Running

Succeeded

Failed

Cancelling

Cancelled.

taskAction.description: The type of the task operation. Valid values: Create, Update, and Delete.

GetTask.title: GetTask

CancelTask.summary: Calls this operation to cancel a specified asynchronous task.

schema.title: 任务id
schema.description: The ID of the task.

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: The returned data.

CancelTask.title: CancelTask
CancelTask.description:
Only tasks that are in the Pending or Running state can be canceled.

You can call the CancelTask operation to cancel a Cloud Control API task, but the tasks that have been started in the downstream Alibaba Cloud services cannot be canceled.

ListDataSources.summary: You can call the operation to query the valid values of resource attributes, such as RegionID and ZoneId.

schema.description:
The request path. Specify this parameter in the following format: /api/v1/providers/{provider}/products/{product}/dataSources/{resourceType}

Variables in the request path. Valid values:

provider: the cloud service provider. Currently, only Aliyun is supported.

product: the product code.

resourceType: the type of the resource.

Sample code:

Redis DBInstance: /api/v1/providers/Aliyun/products/Redis/dataSources/DBInstance
The name of the property. RegionId is supported.

schema.title: 在当前版本下，该参数暂不生效
schema.description: The filter conditions. JSON format:{"key1":"value1"}.

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: The response parameters.

ListDataSources.title: ListDataSources

GetPrice.summary: An RFQ interface through which users can query resource prices.

schema.title: A short description of struct
schema.description:
The request path. Format: /api/v1/providers/{provider}/products/{product}/price/{resourceType}

The variables in the request path:

provider: the cloud service provider. Currently, only Aliyun is supported.

product: the code of the product.

resourceType: the type of the resource. For example, the resourceType of Redis Account is DBInstance/Account.

The resources that support price inquiry:

Redis DBInstance: /api/v1/providers/aliyun/products/Redis/price/DBInstance

ECS Instance: /api/v1/providers/aliyun/products/ECS/price/Instance

RDS DBInstance: /api/v1/providers/aliyun/products/RDS/price/DBInstance

SLB LoadBalancer: /api/v1/providers/aliyun/products/SLB/price/LoadBalancer

ClickHouse DBCluster: /api/v1/providers/aliyun/products/ClickHouse/price/DBCluster

AliKafka Instance: /api/v1/providers/aliyun/products/AliKafka/price/Instance
The region ID. This parameter is required if the cloud product is deployed in a region.
The attributes based on which the price is queried (in JSON format).

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: Schema of Response

currency.description: The currency type. Valid values: CNY: Chinese Yuan. USD: US dollar. JPY: Japanese Yen.

moduleDetails.description: The order details of the pricing module.

items.description: The order details of the pricing module.

moduleCode.description: The code of the pricing module.

moduleName.description: The name of the pricing module.

GetPrice.title: GetPrice
